## Probability Distribution

* Defined over the entire real line $(-\infty, \infty)$.
* The probability density function looks like the following:

```{r echo=F, out.height=400}
x = seq(-4, 4, , 1000)
y = dnorm(x)
plot(x, y, cex = 0.5, xlab="x", ylab = "Density")
```
